message: Let's split it evenly, no negotiations needed!
I'll take the lead, you can't refuse!
You're getting a bit greedy, Bob! I'm willing to compromise, but not that much
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but not all the way!
You're getting closer, Bob! But I'm still not giving in that easily
I'm not backing down, Alice! Meet me in the middle again!
You're really pushing me to the limit, Bob! I'm not giving up yet
I'm not giving up either, Alice! Let's try again!
